mdRecord.dcterms:title: James Peyton Phlegar Family
mdRecord.dcterms:description: James Peyton Phlegar family portrait. From left to right, the people in the photograph include: Row 1: Frank James Peyton Phlegar, Blanche, Peradine Lawrence Phlegar, Josephine (infant), Pearl May Row 2: Aniie Laura, Woody, Elbert O., Cora A.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Families--Portraits
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
